name: Colorize - A Short Exploration Game
description:
You'll play as a character thrust into a world devoid of color. Help the Master Painter find his paint buckets so he can complete his project.

If there are any problems, please comment below so I can fix them. I won't be working on this much more unless it's a problem that prevents people from playing the game.

Created By: Trey Ramm
